> Hi Roberto, we have=
 indeed begun to explore evolving the substrate itself.  Our GECCO paper, "=

is an initial step in this direction:
>

ions/2010/risi.gecco10.html
> 
> At present, we are continuing to refine th=
is approach and finding some interesting results.

ay also be exploring alternative approached to evolving the substrate.  It =
